title: Acropolis
text: Go try it will be fun.its free for children under 18.cool history masive size buildings for that period of time.But they talk about thes resauration a lot.

title: Nice owner,amazing food
text: Me and my dad went to diner on the last night in athens and what we found was a hiden gem. Seriously if your want to eat.GO THERE!And try the bread both of them are great.And the ravioli mama mia just try the ravioli homemade and delicious.Also the owner is an amazing person who want’s to get your opinion on food.if you want he has a story of a wine that you can get only there if your interested. SERIOUSLY GO TO THIS RESTAURANT!

title: Amazing staff!
text: The staff ware so great and friendly.The guy who stands in front the restaurant got any person in who was hungry.He’s the best at his game.Also the food.It was exelent i took the lamb cooked in the jug with potatos and everything was cook like it should.Great plase,amazing food!

title: Overcooked salmon and lack of vegiterian options
text: I found it that the menu was too big for the chef i’d suggest a smaller menu.And the salmon me and my family all took salmon and beleved it was overcooked.
